summary: Completed comprehensive testing of MakeMyDukaan website. Backend APIs working perfectly on localhost:8001, frontend fully functional with all features tested. Critical deployment issue identified with external URL configuration.

critical_bugs.issue: External backend URL returns 404 for all /api/* endpoints
critical_bugs.impact: Production deployment not accessible to external users

passed_tests: Homepage loads with all sections (hero, stats, why digital, services overview)
Navigation between all pages (Home, Services, Contact, About, Portfolio)
Services page displays correct pricing (Starter ₹1,499, Growth ₹2,999, Premium ₹4,999)
Contact form accepts input and submits successfully
WhatsApp button links correctly to https://wa.me/9663112394
Backend health check returns healthy status
Responsive design works on mobile devices
Portfolio page with filter functionality accessible
All CTA buttons clickable and properly routed
action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix external backend URL deployment. The URL https://demobackend.emergentagent.com is returning 404 for all /api/* endpoints while localhost:8001 works perfectly. This needs ingress/proxy configuration to route external traffic to internal port 8001. All backend APIs, frontend features, and integrations are working correctly on localhost.
